{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.05157v1", "title": "Duals and time-reversed flows of generalized Ornstein-Uhlenbeck
  processes", "summary": "We derive explicit representations for the (Siegmund-) dual and the
time-reversed flow of generalized Ornstein-Uhlenbeck processes whenever these
exist. It turns out that the dual and the process corresponding to the reversed
stochastic flow are again generalized Ornstein-Uhlenbeck processes. Further, we
observe that the stationary distribution of the dual process provides
information about the hitting time of zero of the original process.", "main_category": "math.PR", "categories": "math.PR", "published": "2025-04-07T15:00:10Z"}
